Articles.Content:
**Version 1.9**

![pDKi2yp.png](https://i.imgur.com/pDKi2yp.png)

This is a parts pack intended to flesh out the stock mk2 parts lineup by providing new engines, air intakes, and fuselage segments and cockpits in the mk2 formfactor, to give players more options when building spaceplanes and more. All textures are stock textures where possible, using MODEL nodes, so RAM footprint should be minimal.

> 
> [Album a/Tc2kF will appear when post is submitted](//imgur.com/a/Tc2kF)

**-Command**

- 2 kerbal Inverted cockpit with IVA
- 1 kerbal Multi-purpose high visibility cockpit with IVA
- 2 kerbal Mk2-1.25 cockpit with IVA
- 3 kerbal Mk2 spaceplane cockpit with IVA
- 1 Kerbal Bubble canopy with IVA

**-Control**

- Aerodynamic Configurable Monopropellant <abbr title="Reaction Control System"><abbr title="Reaction Control System">RCS</abbr></abbr> block
- Aerodynamic Configurable <abbr title="Liquid Fuel"><abbr title="Liquid Fuel">LF</abbr></abbr>/O OMS block
- 5-Way heavy duty Mk2 conformal <abbr title="Reaction Control System"><abbr title="Reaction Control System">RCS</abbr></abbr> block
- Roll control <abbr title="Reaction Control System"><abbr title="Reaction Control System">RCS</abbr></abbr> chine block
- Prograde/retrograde <abbr title="Reaction Control System"><abbr title="Reaction Control System">RCS</abbr></abbr> chine cap
- Stability Control <abbr title="Reaction Control System"><abbr title="Reaction Control System">RCS</abbr></abbr> and <abbr title="Stability Augmentation System"><abbr title="Stability Augmentation System">SAS</abbr></abbr> module
- Monopropellant OMS pod

-**Air Intakes**

- 1.25m to Mk2 inline air intake
- Ramscoop intake
- Mk2 shock cone intake
- Mk2 precooler
- Mk2 subsonic circular intake

-**Engines**

- 'Vector' Thrust Vector Turbojet
- 'Afterburn' TurboRamJet
- E.S.T.O.C. Dual-cycle Engine
- M.A.T.T.O.C.K. Dual-cycle Engine
- 'Pegasus' Inline <abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing"><abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing">VTOL</abbr></abbr> engine
- 'Siddeley' <abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing"><abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing">VTOL</abbr></abbr> engine
- 'JumpJet' radial <abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing"><abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing">VTOL</abbr></abbr> engine
- 'Wedge' Linear Aerospike
- 'Pluto' Nuclear Engine
- 'Rontgen' Atomic Thermal Jet
- 'Mule' Thrust reverser turbofan
- 'Spirit' Xenon/Electric Engine
- 'J.Edgar' heavy <abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing"><abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing">VTOL</abbr></abbr> engine
- "Mongrel" rocket <abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing"><abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing">VTOL</abbr></abbr> Engine
- 'Wirligig' Turboprop Engine
- 'Boost-O-Tron' Air-Augmented <abbr title="Solid fuel Rocket Booster"><abbr title="Solid fuel Rocket Booster">SRB</abbr></abbr>
- 'Mallet' Air-Augmented <abbr title="Solid fuel Rocket Booster"><abbr title="Solid fuel Rocket Booster">SRB</abbr></abbr>
- 'Sledgehammer' Air-Augmented Ramrocket
- 'Banshee' <abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing"><abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing">VTOL</abbr></abbr> Lift Fan
- 'Hyperblast' Scramjet
- 'Corgi' Rocket Engine
- 'Trident' Rocket Engine

**-Aerodynamic**

- Chines in three flavors
- Mk1 scale chine pieces - short, long, and end cap segments for 1.25m parts
- Mk2 scale chine pieces - short, long, and end cap segments for Mk2 fuselages
- Mk2 scale chine wing root pieces - chine adapter, short, and long segments

-**Fuselage and structural**

- Shrouded 1.25m Engine/Docking Mount
- 2-State 1.25m Aerospace mount
- Mk2 Tailboom
- Hypersonic Mk2 nosecone with integrated <abbr title="Reaction Control System"><abbr title="Reaction Control System">RCS</abbr></abbr>
- Nosecap with integrated <abbr title="Reaction Control System"><abbr title="Reaction Control System">RCS</abbr></abbr>
- Spadetail Mk2 to wing adapter
- Mk2 inverter fuselage
- Mk2-0.625 tricoupler
- Mk2-1.25 tricoupler
- Mk2 short bicoupler
- Mk2 - Mk2 Bicoupler
- Mk2-size2 short adapter
- T, X, and L hubs
- Mk2 Structural Tube
- Mk2 Structural Adapter Short
- Mk2 Structural Adapter Long
- Mk2 decoupler
- Mk2 Service Tank
- Mk2 Science Lab
- Mk2 airlock Endcap
- Mk2 Radial Attach Mount
- Mk2 Long Crew Cabin

**-Utility**

- Shielded Mk2 docking port
- Low-Profile Aligned Docking Port
- Mk2 Service Compartment
- Mk2 Nuclear Reactor
- Mk2 Battery bank
- Mk2 radial shrouded solar panel
- Mk2 nose cargo bay
- Shrouded Thermal Control System
- Shrouded Mk2 Landing Leg
- Mk2 Cargo Container

**DOWNLOAD** 

**-Primary:** [SpaceDock](http://spacedock.info/mod/473/Mk2%20Stockalike%20Expansion)

**-Secondary:** [**Github**](https://github.com/SuicidalInsanity/Mk2Expansion/releases)

**Mk2 Expansion uses as dependencies, and is bundled with, Module Manager, CommunityResourcePack, and B9 PartSwitch**

This mod is also <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)"><abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr></abbr> indexed

Kottabos review: (From Version 1.0)

<iframe allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" height="270" width="480" data-embed-src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/D_A3QBw0FvE?feature=oembed"></iframe>

> 
> [Album a/BHXmt will appear when post is submitted](//imgur.com/a/BHXmt)

**Compatibility**

This mod comes with Module Manager compatibility/interoperability patches for a number of mods.

- Connected Living Space
- Kerbal Atomics
- RasterPropMonitor
- ASET IVA props
- Tweakscale
- <abbr title="Umbra Space Industries (a collection of mods)"><abbr title="Umbra Space Industries (a collection of mods)">USI</abbr></abbr> Life Support
- Deadly ReEntry
- ExtraPlanetary launchpads
- Ferram Aerospace Research
- Modular Fuel Tanks
- Near Future Electrical
- Community Tech Tree
- Modular Fuel Tanks
- Modular Kolony Systems
- RealPlume-Stock
- WindowShine
- System Heat

**F.A.Q.**

- Why won't the game load? KSP crashes when trying to load M2 Expansion parts?
    - Make sure you install the required dependencies, B9 PartSwitch and Community Resource Pack. Both are included with Mk2Expansion in the download. Because M2X uses resources from CRP, KSP will not load if it is missing from your Kerbal Space Program/GameData director
- How can I configure the Mk2 lab to seat 4 kerbals?
    - install the Extras/Mk2Expansion/patches/4Seatlab <abbr title="Module Manager (mod)"><abbr title="Module Manager (mod)">MM</abbr></abbr> patch.
- How do I get the banshee Fans to use Electric Charge or <abbr title="Liquid Fuel"><abbr title="Liquid Fuel">LF</abbr></abbr>/Air?
    - install one of the alternate fuel configs in Extras/Mk2Expansion/Patches/ - either M2X\_AirBreathingBanshee (will no longer work on Eve/Duna/Jool) or M2X\_ElectricBanshee.
- How do I use the Hyperblast Scramjet?

    - You can find a tutorial on how to use the scramjet here:

<iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/109145-13-mk2-expansion-v177-update-7152017/&page=29&do=embed&comment=2818873&embedComment=2818873&embedDo=findComment#comment-2818873"></iframe>

For KSPI and users, or if you want RF engine configs, there is a compatibility pack courtesy of ABZB: [Link](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/131806-Starlion-Industries-KSP-Interstellar-Compatibility-Patches-for-Spaceplanes-CKAN?highlight=kspi)

> > Version 1.7.01 prerelease  
> > 
> > ================================  
> > 
> > new part: mk2 inline drill, for real this time  
> >

> > 
> > Tweaked Banshee, now uses FanIntakeAir to prevent Banshee from acting as a 2m intake for any other jets on the craft  
> > 
> > Vector turbojet alternator now functions during afterburner operation
> >

> > -Added new part: PLUTO engine  
> > 
> > -Added new part: Nosecap  
> > 
> > -Added new part: Fishhead cockpit w/IVA  
> > 
> > -tweaked Turbojet thrust curve - slightly higher max speed  
> > 
> > -tweaked ramjet thrust curve - now produces less thrust subsonic  
> > 
> > -tweaked <abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing"><abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing">VTOL</abbr></abbr> thrust to 170  
> > 
> > -cosmetic tweak to all parts, Z-lighting bugs squashed, some new UV maps  
> > 
> > -Implemented InterstellarFuelSwitch - fuel tanks can now be <abbr title="Liquid Fuel"><abbr title="Liquid Fuel">LF</abbr></abbr>, <abbr title="Liquid Fuel"><abbr title="Liquid Fuel">LF</abbr></abbr>/O or structural, optional patch  
> > 
> > -Interstellarfuelswitch and ModuleManager bundled  
> > 
> > -Added new corporation Insanity Aerospace as manufacturer of all parts for ease of editor sorting
> > 
> > 
> > 
> >

> > 
> > =============

> > hotfix for incorrect file structure
